main event: On December 6, 1957, an observer reported seeing a bright, white light in Joliet, Illinois that appeared stationary before moving rapidly.
interesting points: The object was compared to the brightness of a bright star,It was described as white in color,The sighting lasted for an unspecified duration but the object was noted to move quickly, The observer reported no sound coming from the object,The object disappeared while being observed.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
